typeSystemDescription.name: JCoRe File Multiplier Types
typeSystemDescription.description: This is a type system for usage with a CAS multiplier. It should not be included into the jcore-all-types type system. This particular type system holds a array containing strings that represent the IDs of documents to read. Using an array is used to read batches of document which makes database access more efficient, for example.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.casmultiplier.DocumentIds
typeDescription.description: An array of identifier strings denoting a document. The CAS multiplier receiving the identifiers must have all information to actually read the document.

featureDescription.name: identifiers
featureDescription.description: The document IDs to be read by the CAS multiplier.
